VoiceDir1.FC047: Doesn't care about the lie. Bitter about the bandits, but pleased with himself.
Line3.FC047: Ah come on, don’t be sour, you made good blood money today. Not your first time, now, is it?
Line1.FC047: (scoff) The greedy sand-snakes cut me out...so, I cut you in. Had a feeling you’d come out on top.
